projects.title: React Livestream Platform
projects.description: My first deep dive in using react. A responsive livestream event platform. Complete with an Event page and an Archive page. Integrated with Vimeo using REST API. Built with React for the front end, SCSS for the styling. Worked in tandem with a designer, I converted this page from their Figma design.

projects.title: Author Landing Page
projects.description: A responsive marketing page for the Author of Geriatric Notes. For the Front end I used Bootstrap 5 and custom CSS. To host I used Netlify and connected the Contact form to Netlify's built-in form collection system.

projects.title: Ehya Landing Example
projects.description: A polished responsive marketing page. Converted from a Figma design using Bootstrap 5 and custom CSS styling.

projects.title: WP Livestream Platform
projects.description: A responsive livestream event platform. Built with Wordpress/Divi. Complete with an Archive page and an Event page. I created this site in a way that it could be duplicated, to adapt the site to future events.

projects.title: Light Tower
projects.description: My first Hackathon and first time working within a team. A wonderful  experience of staying up for 48 hours! Worked alongside two UX  designers. Converted their  Figma Design into a responsive landing  page using Vue.js and CSS. We place 2nd!

projects.title: Help Beacon
projects.description: Working in tandem with a team of 5 we built an app that allows people in crisis to reach out to their support  group. I was in charge of  building the landing page using Bootstrap 5. I also introduced a git/github workflow for the other developers. (ill add a more a specific  description. After that we built a lot of the app on react using  BootStrap React. We placed 2nd!

projects.title: Ventia
projects.description: Combined efforts with an experienced team of  developers and designers. Ventia, a safe place to vent. We used React.js, Next.js, CSS-in-JS as well as custom hooks for better control over the responsiveness of the app.

projects.title: My Portfolio!
projects.description: My portfolio! Built with BootStrap 5, CSS and Javascript. Hosted with Netlify.
